Self.Wiki: Determines the timezone conversion parameters for a cutscene.

disableParam_NT.Wiki: Exclude from the NT version or mark the ones to be excluded.

disableParam_Product.Wiki: Exclude from the product version or mark the items to be excluded.

SrcTimezoneStart.Wiki: Start time of the time zone to be converted to cutscene time. In hours.

DstCutscenTime.Wiki: Enter the time used during cutscene playback. In hours.
